attributes.action: Exempt all 125cc motorbikes and below from road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would encourage more use of small bikes and ease road congestion it has been proven in London less cars more bikes less accidents and freer flow of traffic also this would help the environment with less pollution and less wear and tear on our roads this would also equal in a more relaxed environment.
